referrals.title: üè® Recommend a Hotel and Earn Rewards
referrals.description:
Anyone, regardless of their occupation, can earn rewards simply by referring hotels to our platform.

The process is simple: if you know a hotel that could benefit from being part of Hotel Living, just complete the form below, indicating the country, city and hotel name.

If that hotel joins our system within one month of your recommendation date, you will receive a reward of 4% of the gross total of all bookings they receive during the following 18 months, and an additional reward of 2% during the subsequent year.

These rewards are granted directly by Hotel Living. It is important to note that they do not affect the recommended hotel at all, nor does the hotel become aware of them, since they do not alter their conditions or generate any additional cost.
referrals.paymentInfoDescription: Enter your payment details for reward processing
referrals.confirmationMessage: Thank you for your referral! We'll review it and get back to you.

validation.hotelsRequired: Please add at least one hotel
